Name: Vonbit
About the game: Vonbit is a simple 2D arcade shooter where you aim to get the highest score by shooting down moving enemies while avoiding their projectiles. It features low-resolution one-bit graphics and a low frame rate - all of which add to the retro experience!
Meta Title: Vonbit: Mar 31, 2022, Chris Boyfield and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Vonbit? Check out the release date (Mar 31, 2022), developer insights from Chris Boyfield, and a complete game summary.
